Pre-Game Insights: France have reached three of the last four major tournament finals.
They are looking for redemption at these Euros after losing out in the quarter-finals to Switzerland three years ago, before suffering a penalty shootout loss to Argentina at the last World Cup.
Canada will be looking to give the home team a tough challenge as in their first international friendly they got hammered by the Dutch.
In a few days, the Canadian team are going to compete at the Copa America, where they are placed in Group A along with Argentina, Chile and Peru.
This friendly will surely test their capabilities to compete against top-quality opponents.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Kick-Off: Sunday, 9 June 2024 at 07:15 PM (GMT), 02:45 PM (EST)
France score 3.86 goals when playing at home and Canada score 1.4 goals when playing away (on average).
The winner of their last meeting was France.
When France lead 1-0 at home, they win 100% of their matches.
Others: Dayot Upamecano will be rested for this upcoming match due to a thigh injury, but all the other players are fit and available.

Canada Predicted Lineup (4-4-2): St.Clair (GK); Laryea, Miller, Cornelius, Davies; Buchanan, Eustaquio, Kone, Hoilett; David, Larin
